primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God initiates a movement of grace toward humanity, who are lost sheep unable to find their way back, culminating in Christ taking on human iniquity and nakedness on the Cross.

tekstueel_bewijs: The LORD has laid on him the iniquity of us all
God looks at us and sees otherwise
The Son of God gave up all his divine prerogatives and came into the world
the salvation of the whole world
declared that we were not enemies but friends

zender.identificatie: God the Father (The source of goodness/mercy)
tekstueel_bewijs: the Christian gospel does not start with us... but with God and his goodness

ontvanger.identificatie: Humanity / The Hearer ('The man with no trousers')
tekstueel_bewijs: he does it for love of us

helper.identificatie: Jesus Christ (as the one who takes the iniquity)
tekstueel_bewijs: The LORD has laid on him the iniquity of us all

tegenstander.identificatie: Sin / Self-will / Death / The 'Heart of Darkness'
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: Sin is described as a 'heart of darkness' and 'iniquity' that renders humans 'lost' and 'enemies of God'—a state requiring divine intervention.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The human attempt to cover nakedness/sin through 'potential' or 'righteous deeds'.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer / Humanity
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program is exposed as a failure (filthy rags) to clear the way for the primary program (Grace).

voorbeelden_god_subject: The Son of God gave up all his divine prerogatives
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We have drifted a long way
each of us has turned aside

voorbeelden: Ten Commandments were not the Ten Suggestions
Each of us wants to pursue his own course
we are losing the knowledge of God
found it impossible, humanly speaking, to avoid this

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on human INABILITY (non-pouvoir-faire) which necessitates God's POUVOIR (Grace).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S1 (God is gracious) to ~S1 (Human potential) to S2 (Iniquity/Sin) and finally to ~S2 (The vulnerable man with no trousers) where S1 meets him.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Christ occupies the position of the 'man with no trousers' (S2/nakedness) to bestow S1 (Grace).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; sin is described as 'filthy rags' and 'heart of darkness'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon explicitly rejects human potential as a means of salvation and positions God as the primary actor who moves toward the helpless.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: By your presence here today, you demonstrate your commitment

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as Subject of the Gospel
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: the Christian gospel does not start with us... but with God
lost their bearings altogether... cannot find their way back

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures are used to illustrate the human condition (sin) rather than as models for behavior.
bijbelse_figuren_als_model: The Tax Collector (as a model of prayer, not performance)

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and humility; realization of shared vulnerability.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Justification by grace alone through the substitutionary work of Christ.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The metaphor of the 'man with no trousers' perfectly bridges the gap between the human condition and the Cross.
spanning_punten: The tension between the 'chosen few' in the audience and the 'millions' outside.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: The LORD has laid on him the iniquity of us all

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon focuses on the work of the Son; the Spirit's role in applying this is not explicit.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; sin is an estrangement that humans cannot fix.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The narrative engine is powered by God's mercy toward a helpless Subject (Humanity).

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain current balance for a Good Friday context.
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: The sermon successfully moves from Devoir (Law) to Pouvoir (Grace).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in theocentric preaching that uses a vivid secular metaphor to illuminate the deep structure of the substitutionary atonement.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the Orwell anecdote; semiotics shows how that anecdote functions as an actantial shift from Enemy to Fellow-creature.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the Hebrew of Isaiah 53; semiotics focuses on how the 'Sheep' actant is defined by its lack of direction.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Man with no trousers' is the 'Object' of God's 'Desire' precisely because of his lack of 'Competence'.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of Fleming Rutledge's 'Grammar of Grace'.
